mean_en: one of several frequent changes in size, amount, quality, etc, especially from one extreme to another; the act of changing frequently like this
sentence: The fluctuation in our data shows that our production is not stable enough.
sentence_trans: 数据的波动说明了我们的产量还不够稳定。
word_etyma: fluctu波浪 + ation表示行为、情况、状态、过程、结果 → fluctuation波动，起伏
